Package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options

Package containing classes for the External Formatter option panel.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FormatterOptionsPanel  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormatterOptionsPanel
    Abstract base implementation of FormatterOptionsPanel.
    ExternalFormatterOptionsPanelController
    OptionsPanelController implementation for the ExternalFormatterPanel.
    ExternalFormatterPanel
    The options panel for this plugin.
    ExternalFormatterPreferencesChangeSupport
    Holder of a ChangeSupport to fire and listen on property changes.
    Settings
    Settings utility class.
